plugin.name: help-balloons
plugin.author: Paul Fernley
plugin.title: Grails TagLib plugin for the HelpBalloon system from Beau Scott
plugin.description: The help-balloons plugin provides a Grails TagLib wrapper around the HelpBalloon system from Beau Scott. This plugin provides the most basic support possible to give a simple balloon help (a.k.a. Callout) facility in GSPs typically for use in intranet applications.
